verses.verse: וַיְהִ֧י <WH1961> came דְבַר־ <WH1697> And the word יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to יוֹנָ֖ה <WH3124> came unto Jonah שֵׁנִ֥ית <WH8145> the second לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> time saying

ק֛וּם <WH6965> Arise לֵ֥ךְ <WH1980> go אֶל־ <WH413> to נִֽינְוֵ֖ה <WH5210> unto Nineveh הָעִ֣יר <WH5892> city הַגְּדוֹלָ֑ה <WH1419> that great וִּקְרָ֤א <WH7121> and preach אֵלֶ֙יהָ֙ <WH413> about אֶת־ <WH853> הַקְּרִיאָ֔ה <WH7150> unto it the preaching אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which אָנֹכִ֖י <WH595> I דֹּבֵ֥ר <WH1696> that I bid אֵלֶֽיךָ׃ <WH413> about

וַיָּ֣קָם <WH6965> arose יוֹנָ֗ה <WH3124> So Jonah וַיֵּ֛לֶךְ <WH1980> and went אֶל־ <WH413> to נִֽינְוֶ֖ה <WH5210> unto Nineveh כִּדְבַ֣ר <WH1697> according to the word יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD וְנִֽינְוֵ֗ה <WH5210> Now Nineveh הָיְתָ֤ה <WH1961> become עִיר־ <WH5892> city גְּדוֹלָה֙ <WH1419> great לֵֽאלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> was an exceeding מַהֲלַ֖ךְ <WH4109> journey שְׁלֹ֥שֶׁת <WH7969> of three יָמִֽים׃ <WH3117> days'

וַיָּ֤חֶל <WH2490> began יוֹנָה֙ <WH3124> And Jonah לָב֣וֹא <WH935> to enter בָעִ֔יר <WH5892> into the city מַהֲלַ֖ךְ <WH4109> journey י֣וֹם <WH3117> day's אֶחָ֑ד <WH259> a וַיִּקְרָא֙ <WH7121> and he cried וַיֹּאמַ֔ר <WH559> and said ע֚וֹד <WH5750> Yet אַרְבָּעִ֣ים <WH705> Yet forty י֔וֹם <WH3117> days וְנִֽינְוֵ֖ה <WH5210> and Nineveh נֶהְפָּֽכֶת׃ <WH2015> shall be overthrown

וַֽיַּאֲמִ֛ינוּ <WH539> believed אַנְשֵׁ֥י <WH376> the people נִֽינְוֵ֖ה <WH5210> of Nineveh בֵּֽאלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> God וַיִּקְרְאוּ־ <WH7121> and proclaimed צוֹם֙ <WH6685> a fast וַיִּלְבְּשׁ֣וּ <WH3847> and put שַׂקִּ֔ים <WH8242> on sackcloth מִגְּדוֹלָ֖ם <WH1419> from the greatest וְעַד־ <WH5704> against קְטַנָּֽם׃ <WH6996> of them even to the least

וַיִּגַּ֤ע <WH5060> came הַדָּבָר֙ <WH1697> For word אֶל־ <WH413> about מֶ֣לֶך <WH4428> unto the king נִֽינְוֵ֔ה <WH5210> of Nineveh וַיָּ֙קָם֙ <WH6965> and he arose מִכִּסְא֔וֹ <WH3678> from his throne וַיַּעֲבֵ֥ר <WH5674> and he laid אַדַּרְתּ֖וֹ <WH155> his robe מֵֽעָלָ֑יו <WH5921> and וַיְכַ֣ס <WH3680> from him and covered שַׂ֔ק <WH8242> [him] with sackcloth וַיֵּ֖שֶׁב <WH3427> and sat עַל־ <WH5921> on הָאֵֽפֶר׃ <WH665> in ashes

וַיַּזְעֵ֗ק <WH2199> And he caused [it] to be proclaimed וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> and published בְּנִֽינְוֵ֔ה <WH5210> through Nineveh מִטַּ֧עַם <WH2940> by the decree הַמֶּ֛לֶךְ <WH4428> of the king וּגְדֹלָ֖יו <WH1419> and his nobles לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying הָאָדָ֨ם <WH120> Let neither man וְהַבְּהֵמָ֜ה <WH929> nor beast הַבָּקָ֣ר <WH1241> herd וְהַצֹּ֗אן <WH6629> nor flock אַֽל־ <WH408> nay יִטְעֲמוּ֙ <WH2938> taste מְא֔וּמָה <WH3972> any thing אַ֨ל־ <WH408> not יִרְע֔וּ <WH7462> let them not feed וּמַ֖יִם <WH4325> water אַל־ <WH408> not יִשְׁתּֽוּ׃ <WH8354> nor drink

וְיִתְכַּסּ֣וּ <WH3680> be covered שַׂקִּ֗ים <WH8242> with sackcloth הָֽאָדָם֙ <WH120> But let man וְהַבְּהֵמָ֔ה <WH929> and beast וְיִקְרְא֥וּ <WH7121> and cry אֶל־ <WH413> on אֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> unto God בְּחָזְקָ֑ה <WH2394> mightily וְיָשֻׁ֗בוּ <WH7725> yea let them turn אִ֚ישׁ <WH376> every one מִדַּרְכּ֣וֹ <WH1870> way הָֽרָעָ֔ה <WH7451> from his evil וּמִן־ <WH4480> and from הֶחָמָ֖ס <WH2555> and from the violence אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which בְּכַפֵּיהֶֽם׃ <WH3709> that [is] in their hands

מִֽי־ <WH4310> Who יוֹדֵ֣עַ <WH3045> Who can tell יָשׁ֔וּב <WH7725> will turn וְנִחַ֖ם <WH5162> and repent הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> [if] God וְשָׁ֛ב <WH7725> and turn away מֵחֲר֥וֹן <WH2740> from his fierce אַפּ֖וֹ <WH639> anger וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> we will not נֹאבֵֽד׃ <WH6> that we perish

וַיַּ֤רְא <WH7200> saw הָֽאֱלֹהִים֙ <WH430> And God אֶֽת־ <WH853> מַ֣עֲשֵׂיהֶ֔ם <WH4639> their works כִּי־ <WH3588> for שָׁ֖בוּ <WH7725> that they turned מִדַּרְכָּ֣ם <WH1870> way הָרָעָ֑ה <WH7451> from their evil וַיִּנָּ֣חֶם <WH5162> repented הָאֱלֹהִ֗ים <WH430> and God עַל־ <WH5921> concerning הָרָעָ֛ה <WH7451> of the evil אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which דִּבֶּ֥ר <WH1696> that he had said לַעֲשׂוֹת־ <WH6213> that he would do לָהֶ֖ם <WH1992> like וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> did not עָשָֽׂה׃ <WH6213> unto them and he did
